ROM.Changelog: * update prima (wifi driver) to LA.UM.5.6.r1-06200-89xx.0 * Fixed fp gestures thx highwaystar * Reverted to stock audio hal for now oss is little unstable * google assistant is triggered when homebutton is pressed twice instead of long press * Fingerprint: Setting up Pattern/Pin Fc fixed * Dotextras:dotOTA added * fix dot version unknown * speed up lockscreen anims * Added timber as default music app * Display :Qspanel theme engine * QS tile titles visibility * Three Finger Swipe for Screenshot * Advanced Bluetooth, Data, Wifi Toggles * Screenshot crop and share * Fingerprint authentication vibration * dotpapers: New walls added * Pocket mode added * added camera sound toggle * Allow disabling of FC dialogs * QS Header Icon settings* and few more bug fixes
